nodes.text: An umbrella-like creature lived on the Forest Moon of Endor. The creature had two long, purple legs, each of which sported a clawed, two-toed foot. The creature's head, which held two white eyes with black pupils, was wide like an umbrella and bore stripes that alternated blue and red.

In 3 ABY, the Ewoks Kneesaa a Jari Kintaka and Latara used the creature, who wore yellow shorts, as a source of shade while they rested on the beach of a pond near a forest on Endor. However, when Kintaka and Latara's friend Wicket Wystri Warrick leaped into the otherwise still water, he splashed them and the creature. Startled, the creature let out a shriek before retreating into the forest as Latara and Kintaka chided Warrick.

The unidentified creature appeared in "The Season Scepter," the thirteenth episode in the second season of the animated television series Ewoks. The episode was written by Bob Carrau and premiered on November 1, 1986.
